Decision taken are Ordering optimal quantity basis S=High or S=Low at the beginning with no top up or order S=Low optimal with a top up to match S=High
for both pre and in season ordering, the pre order could be placed till Q0/low or Q0/high and then basis high signal, place the next order to add Q1
